import React, { useState } from 'react' import { SiPhonepe } from "react-icons/si"; const Billing = () => { const [cName , setcName]=useState(null) const [Persons , setPersons]=useState(null) const [Contact , setContact]=useState(null) const [Nights , setNights]=useState(null) const [Check_In , setCheck_In]=useState(null) const [Check_out , setCheck_out]=useState(null) const [GST , setGST]=useState(null) // const [cName , setcName]=useState(null) // const [cName , setcName]=useState(null) // const [cName , setcName]=useState(null) return (

Kingfisher Jungle Stay

Dandeli

  • Date

    08/01/2024

Customer Details

Name setcName(e.target.value)} style={{width:'50%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px'}}/> Persons setPersons(e.target.value)} style={{width:'20%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px'}}/>
Contact setContact(e.target.value)} style={{width:'50%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px'}}/> Nights setNights(e.target.value)} style={{width:'10%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px'}}/>
Check In setCheck_In(e.target.value)} style={{width:'20%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px',padding:"2px"}}/> Check out setCheck_out(e.target.value)} style={{width:'18%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'4px'}}/> GST setGST(e.target.value)} style={{width:'19%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px'}}/>

Packages & Activities

Activites setActivites(e.target.value)} style={{width:'20%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px'}}/> Amenities setAmenities(e.target.value)} style={{width:'18%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px'}}/>
Food Cost setFood_Cost(e.target.value)} style={{width:'20%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px'}}/>

Select Payment

setphonepe(e.target.value)} name='t1' style={{width:'5%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px',marginLeft:'5px'}}/> < SiPhonepe /> setCash(e.target.value)} name='t1' style={{width:'5%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px',marginLeft:'-35%'}}/> Cash setCard(e.target.value)} name='t1' style={{width:'5%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px',marginLeft:'-35%'}}/> Card setAdvance_Payment(e.target.value)} name='t1' style={{width:'4%', border:'1px solid black' ,borderRadius:'10px'}}/> Advance Payment
